title: Off Track
description: I really messed up the whole first comes love, then comes marriage, then comes the baby carriage.Here's my version.First comes the blind date with an incredibly sexy football coach.Then comes the friends with benefits that you know is so wrong but you don’t care because it feels so right.Then comes the unexpected baby carriage.Emphasis on unexpected.Except Davis doesn’t want the same things I do.I want to fall in love.He says love isn’t for him.I want a family.He has made it clear that a family is not on his agenda.But babies don’t care about your plans.They come when they are ready.Even if you aren’t.The same can be said about falling in love.Off Track is Book 2 in the Nashville Fury series. It can be read as a complete standalone. It features:Pro football coachSouthern belleAccidental pregnancyBlind dateWill they or won't theyNo third act breakupLow angst
author: Chelle Sloan
